# Simple TODO-App Example (CLI)

This example shows how to implement a **TODO-app as a CLI tool** with Node.JS and Prisma.

__INLINE(../../_setup.md)__

### 4. Use the app

```sh
npm run cli
```

#### Add a `Todo` item

```sh
npm run cli add Groceries
```

#### List all `Todo` items

```sh
npm run cli list
```

#### Delete a `Todo` item

```sh
npm run cli delete Groceries
```
